title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: 100g Pecorino Romano or Parmesan, finely grated
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the spaghetti until al dente.
While the pasta cooks, fry the pancetta in a skillet until crispy. Remove from heat and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and most of the grated cheese together. Add a generous amount of black pepper.
Reserve a cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti.
Quickly toss the hot spaghetti with the egg and cheese mixture off the heat, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Mix in the crispy pancetta, adjust seasoning, and serve topped with remaining cheese and more black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 600g boneless chicken thighs, cut into pieces
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, half the garam masala, cumin, coriander and salt for at least 1 hour (overnight ideal).
Grill or sear the marinated chicken until cooked through and slightly charred. Set aside.
In a pan, sauté onions in butter until golden. Add remaining spices and cook briefly.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer until thickened, then stir in cream and return the chicken to the sauce.
Simmer for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: Quick and colorful vegetables tossed in a tangy soy-garlic sauce.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and stir briefly until fragrant.
Add harder vegetables first (carrot, broccoli) and stir-fry for 2–3 minutes.
Add bell peppers and continue to stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar and sesame oil; pour over vegetables and toss to coat.
Serve immediately over steamed rice or noodles.

title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
summary: Creamy avocado on toasted bread topped with a silky poached egg and chilli flakes.
ingredients: 2 slices of sourdough or wholegrain bread
instructions: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Poach the eggs to desired doneness.
Spread avocado on toast, top with the poached egg, sprinkle chilli flakes and serve.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells loaded with seasoned beef, fresh salsa and cilantro.
ingredients: 1 packet taco seasoning or homemade mix
instructions: Cook the ground beef in a skillet until browned, drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water; simmer until beef is coated and flavorful.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomatoes/salsa, cheese and cilantro.

title: Lemon Drizzle Cake
summary: Moist and zesty cake finished with a sweet tangy lemon glaze.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease and line a loaf tin.
Cream butter and sugar, then beat in eggs one at a time.
Fold in flour and lemon zest until just combined.
Pour batter into tin and bake for 45–55 minutes until a skewer comes out clean.
Mix lemon juice with icing sugar to make the drizzle; pour over warm cake.
